title: a2289 T2 swapping help
message:
Hello! im first time on this forum, my name is Miguel and i starts in this works 1 year ago.

I bought a2289 coffe spilled, no power and after some small repairs i see cpu doing really strange thinks, i bought working board but locked in eBay for swap my T2 chip
After some trys i did a really good reballing and put T2, SOC ROM and SEP EEPROM from faulty board to the locked one but i got this error in Apple configurator in 4/4 when is installing OS to the disk
[ATTACH type="full"]61312[/ATTACH]

So is when installing OS and i think is t2 to ssd some failed, can help me?

title: a2289 T2 swapping help
message: Macbook starts in Recovery mode but not in DFU, i got trackpad response and power off response, i can swap to DFU mode with keys combination but same error in 4/4

title: a2289 T2 swapping help
message:
First of all, welcome to the forum!

Force the machine off; press power button 4-5s.
Then put in DFU with keys combination.

BTW, connect charger cable before DFU cable.
Also keep the battery connected.

title: a2289 T2 swapping help
message:
Por favor, escribe directamente en la casilla de reply, en vez de dar click al boton Reply.
No veo ninguna razon para repetir entero un post visible unos centimetros mas arriba.

Tanto en restore como revive, te sale mismo errorarriba mencionado?
Has conectado primero el cable del cargador?

Asegurate no tener corto en ninguna barra de tension secundaria.

Prueba DFU con U4770 vacio.
No olvides hacer un backup primero!
Tambien puedes probar con ese:
[URL unfurl="true"]https://drive.google.com/file/d/1RYLJqs0TJ-FnqJS6CL5ThPCJ3C_x6B-V/view?usp=sharing[/URL]

title: a2289 T2 swapping help
message:
SoC ROM es de 1.8V y necesitas un adaptador de tension.
Hay varios hilos en el foro sobre ese asunto...

title: a2289 T2 swapping help
message:
La bateria tiene algo de carga?

Asegurate que el equipo consuma corriente del cargdor y no del otro laptop por el cable DFU.
Conecta primero el cargador y mira si el USB-meter siga indicando un consumo, incluso despues de conectar el cable DFU.
